page.title: 18CROPS
page.content: Almost allthe area around Eagle is cultivated. The most important crops that are grown in the area are oil seed rape,potatoes,winter wheat and winter barley.Other common crops are stubble turnips,grass,spring barley,carrots,and sugar beet. Less common crops that are grown in the area are triticale, rye, lupins, linseed, evening primrose,and duram wheat. Evening primrose and lupins go to the drug industry.Triticale is grown because it is high in protein and fibre and it is used for bread making and so is duram wheat.Oil seed rape is often used as a break crop. This means it rests the land and helps to get rid of pests. Its oil can be used to save on imports and it is profitable to farmers. It is used in the making of margarine and cooking oil.
